journey.title: Full Stack Developer at G-Fam Mediatech
journey.text: Working as Full Stack Developer at G-Fam Mediatech where I build and deploy scalable web applications using Django, REST APIs, and modern frontend stacks.

journey.text: Completed Bachelor’s degree at Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh and built strong foundations in computer science and mathematics.

projects.name: Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive web app that visualizes multiple sorting algorithms with real-time animations.
highlights: Visualizes Bubble, Insertion, Selection, Merge, and Quick Sort step by step.
Built in vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for maximum performance.
Includes adjustable speed and array size for better understanding of algorithms.
Designed a clean UI that highlights comparisons and swaps in real time.

projects.name: SmartKart — E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Python Django based e-commerce platform with full authentication and order flows.
highlights: Implemented JWT based auth with roles for users, sellers, and admins.
Built REST APIs for cart, wishlist, orders, payments, and inventory.
Integrated ML based recommendation engine using cosine similarity.
Created responsive dashboards using React.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: MyPrepSpot — Library Booking
projects.description: Library booking and productivity platform for managing seat reservations.
highlights: Developed booking flow for reserving library seats and managing sessions.
Designed intuitive UI for checking availability and current bookings.
Implemented secure backend APIs and role based access.
Optimized experience for students preparing for competitive exams.

projects.name: Career-F-Crawler
projects.description: Flask based job insights tool that analyzes job descriptions.
highlights: Used BeautifulSoup and PDF parsing to extract raw job text from multiple sources.
Applied scikit-learn and Pandas to analyze skills and patterns in job data.
Built interactive web UI in Flask for uploading and viewing analysis.
Helps students understand skill gaps for target job roles.
